pageContext.claim: “American pensions have grown more than $2 trillion in value since the election.”
pageContext.analysis: It's not clear where Trump is getting this figure. According to Pensions & Investments magazine, the 200 largest U.S. pension plans gained nearly $1 trillion last year. But these measures look at a snapshot in time of pension funds that changes from moment to moment. Plus, touting these funds success doesn't necessarily spell good news. Many pension plans - especially public sector plans - are swimming in debt.
